name: tposfn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wfn(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1)))

stmt.origin: 3imtr4i(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wfn(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1)), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), universe), wf(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wfn(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1)))
-| wi(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), universe), wf(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1), universe))
-| wb(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), universe))
-| wb(wfn(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1)), wf(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wfn(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1)))
-| wi(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), universe), wf(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1), universe))
-| wb(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), universe))
-| wb(wfn(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1)), wf(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1), universe))

body.origin: |- wi(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), universe), wf(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wfn(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1)))
-| wb(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), universe))
-| wb(wfn(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1)), wf(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1), universe))

body.origin: |- wb(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wfn(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1)))
-| wb(wfn(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1)), wf(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1), universe))

body.origin: |- wb(wfn(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1)), wf(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1), universe))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wfn(ctpos(c0), cxp(c2, c1)))

comment: Functionality of a transposition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
